Are you sure you want to delete this study?
This action can not be undone!
delete_studies_body:
Are you sure you want to delete these studies?
This action can not be undone!
delete_series_body:
Are you sure you want to delete this series?
This action can not be undone!
delete_instance_body:
Are you sure you want to delete this instance?
This action can not be undone!
enter_search: Enter a search criteria to show results!

modify.error_attach_series_to_existing_study_ta: Error while changing series, no study found with this StudyInstanceUID.
Error while changing series, the target study is the same as the current series study.
modify.error_attach_study_to_existing_patient_t: Error while changing patient, no patient found with this PatientID. You should probably use the Modify Study tags function instead.
modify.error_modify_any_study_tags_patient_exis: Error while modifying study tags: another patient with the same PatientID already exists. You should use the Change patient function instead.
modify.error_modify_any_study_tags_can_not_modi: Error while modifyting study tags: this patient has other studies. You should use the Modify Patient tags function instead.
modify.error_modify_patient_tags_another_patien: Error while modifying a patient tags: another patient with the same PatientID already exists. You should use the Modify Patient tags function instead.
modify.error_modify_unexpected_error_html: Unexpected error during modification, check Orthanc logs
modify.modify_mode_new_uids_html: Modify the original study.  <small>(generating new DICOM UIDs)</small>
modify.modify_mode_keep_uids_html: Modify the original study.  <small>(keeping the original DICOM UIDs)</small>
modify.modify_mode_duplicate_html: Create a modified copy of the original study.  <small>(generating new DICOM UIDs and keeping the original study)</small>
modify.series_step_0_attach_series_to_existing_: Move this series to an existing Study.
modify.series_step_0_create_new_study_html: Move this series to a new study.
modify.series_step_0_modify_series_html: Modify Series tags in this series only ?
modify.study_step_0_attach_study_to_existing_pa: Attach this study to an other existing Patient.
modify.study_step_0_patient_has_other_studies_h:
This patient has {count} studies in total.
Do you want to modify the patient in all these studies ?
modify.study_step_0_modify_study_html: Modify Patient/Study tags in this study only ?
modify.warning_create_new_study_from_series_htm: A patient with the same PatientID already exists with differing tags.  Do you want to use the existing PatientName, PatientSex and PatientBirthDate ?

not_showing_all_results: Not showing all results. You should refine your search criteria
plugins_not_enabled: Plugins that are loaded but not enabled or not configured correctly are

retrieve_and_view.finding_locally: Checking if the study is already available locally.
retrieve_and_view.finding_remotely: Searching for the study in remote DICOM nodes.
retrieve_and_view.not_found: The study was not found neither locally nor in remote DICOM nodes.

this_patient_has_other_studies: This patient has {count} studies in total.
this_patient_has_no_other_studies: This patient has no other studies.
